description.narrative: The project seeks to contribute to greater understanding and respect of human rights in rural and urban areas of North Kivu, DR Congo. This project will contribute to the overall objective by encouraging and training communities, especially women, civil society organizations and local authorities to play a positive and proactive role in the protection of civilians and community cohesion by encouraging communities to replicate and adapt best practices in their context and by complementing the project approach with the promotion of innovations to attain these objectives.
